players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed on the first night. We should all share our thoughts to figure out who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I'm shocked about Alice's death too. We should all be careful and share our thoughts without jumping to conclusions."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed town."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's investigation. Charlie could be the mafioso, so we should vote for him to protect the town."
Charlie: "I don't believe Bob; he couldn't have investigated both me and Diana in one night as the detective. Maybe he's the real mafia trying to mislead us!"
You: "Charlie, you're lying. I only investigated you, not Diana. Diana is confirmed by my investigation of you as mafia, since there's only one mafia. Vote Charlie with me."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
